Create a smart scissors app that can recognize and cut out specific objects from images or videos. This app could use machine learning algorithms to identify the desired object and then use the scissors tool to cut it out.
Develop a scissors that can cut through multiple layers of materials at once. This could be useful for cutting through multiple sheets of paper, cardboard, or even fabric.
Create a scissors that canate objects by cutting them into smaller pieces. This could be useful for breaking down larger objects into smaller, more manageable pieces.
